field for growing happiness/domain for practices leading to enlightenment (Buddhism)
good fortune/happiness/luck
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
field/farm/CL:片[pian4]
surname Tian
Futian district of Shenzhen City 深圳市, Guangdong
FUKUDA Yasuo (1936-), Japanese LDP politician, prime minister 2007-2008

sentences.english: Mr Fukuda, by contrast, has a family legacy to enshrine.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，福田康夫有參拜神廟的家庭傳統。

sentences.english: On the basis of last year, the products of Foton Lovol have realized new development this year.
sentences.chinese: 福田雷沃產品在去年的基礎上，今年又有新的發展。

sentences.english: Fukuda had a old lend hull.
sentences.chinese: 借殼福田已經是個老話題。

sentences.english: He says pigs are not a danger to people.
sentences.chinese: 福田敬二說，豬對人類沒有危險。

sentences.english: We need a new team to carry out policies," Fukuda said.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要一個新團隊來執行政策，”福田康夫表示。

sentences.english: The flag- rasing ceremony of Shenzhen Futian Free Trade Zone Pirmary School now begins.
sentences.chinese: 深圳市福田保稅區小學第周升旗儀式現在開始。

sentences.english: In the practice of it, Mr Fukuda père opened diplomatic relations with China.
sentences.chinese: 基於此福田赳夫政府實現了與中國恢復邦交。

sentences.english: Five years ago, Eriko Fukuda could have been forgiven for thinking that life had dealt her a poor hand.
sentences.chinese: 五年前，福田惠理子認爲她的人生坎坷。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is the SWOT strategy analysis.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，格屋福田市場SWOT策略分析。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I had fruitful talks with Prime Minister Fukuda.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天同福田首相舉行了富有成果的會談。

sentences.english: Fukuda is expected to name his Cabinet members later Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 福田將於週二晚些時候任命他的內閣成員。

sentences.english: My company is located in the heart of the Futian District of Shenzhen Commercial Street.
sentences.chinese: 我公司位於深圳繁華的福田區商業街。

sentences.english: Mr Hu and Mr Fukuda had plenty to talk about.
sentences.chinese: 胡主席和福田首相談了很多。

sentences.english: 'You'd have to institute very draconian restrictions to have an impact,' said Fukuda.
sentences.chinese: 福田敬二說，必須採取非常嚴格的限制才能產生效果。

sentences.english: Everyday, people travel through the Futian port.
sentences.chinese: 每天，人們從福田機場經過。

sentences.english: He was foreign minister under both Mr Koizumi and Mr Abe.
sentences.chinese: 他在小泉和福田兩屆內閣裏擔任外相。
